description: Configures the Device Defender audit settings for this account. Settings include how audit notifications are sent and which audit checks are enabled or disabled.

AuditCheckConfigurations.description: Specifies which audit checks are enabled and disabled for this account.
AuditCheckConfigurations.markdownDescription:
Specifies which audit checks are enabled and disabled for this account.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AuditNotificationTargetConfigurations.description: Information about the targets to which audit notifications are sent.
AuditNotificationTargetConfigurations.markdownDescription:
Information about the targets to which audit notifications are sent.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AuditCheckConfiguration.description: The configuration for a specific audit check.

Enabled.description: True if the check is enabled.
Enabled.markdownDescription:
True if the check is enabled.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

AuditCheckConfiguration.markdownDescription:
The configuration for a specific audit check.

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetArn.description: The ARN of the target (SNS topic) to which audit notifications are sent.
TargetArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the target (SNS topic) to which audit notifications are sent.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The ARN of the role that grants permission to send notifications to the target.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the role that grants permission to send notifications to the target.

Minimum Length: 20
